name: stryker-mutator
description: Test your tests with mutation testing.

strykerMutator.enable.description: Enable or disable Stryker mutation testing integration for this workspace.

strykerMutator.watchPattern.markdownDescription: Glob pattern for files to watch for changes and trigger mutation discovery. Uses [VS Code glob pattern syntax](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/editor/glob-patterns#_glob-pattern-syntax).

strykerMutator.server.path.description: Path to the Stryker server executable. Can be absolute or relative to the workspace folder.

strykerMutator.server.args.description: Arguments to pass to the Stryker server process when starting.

strykerMutator.server.workingDirectory.description: Working directory for the Stryker server process. Defaults to the workspace folder if not set.

strykerMutator.server.configFile.description: Path to the Stryker configuration file to use. Can be absolute or relative to the workspace folder.

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
